scripts.test:memory-leak: pnpm -F emberfest-2024-memory-leaks-app start:memory-leak-detector & pid=$!; pnpm -F emberfest-2024-memory-leaks-app test:memory-leak; wait $pid
scripts.test:memory-leak-server: pnpm -F emberfest-2024-memory-leaks-app start:memory-leak-detector & pid=$!; pnpm -F emberfest-2024-memory-leaks-app test:memory-leak --server; wait $pid
scripts.test:users: pnpm -F emberfest-2024-memory-leaks-app start:memory-leak-detector & pid=$!; pnpm -F emberfest-2024-memory-leaks-app test:users; wait $pid
scripts.test:users-server: pnpm -F emberfest-2024-memory-leaks-app start:memory-leak-detector & pid=$!; pnpm -F emberfest-2024-memory-leaks-app test:users --server; wait $pid
